ImplementedSecurityControls: Minimum balance requirement (MinSum) in Collect to protect against withdrawals below threshold.
KnownVulnerabilities: Reentrancy vulnerability in Collect due to lack of reentrancy guard.
Time lock mechanism in Collect is limited and does not include advanced checks against external calls.
FallbackFunctionality: Fallback function exists to accept Ether and calls Put(0) on deposit.
